design_philosophy.visual_style: Soft curves, generous whitespace, warm lighting, texture over gradients
design_philosophy.core_metaphor: A porcelain plate with a perfect slice of cake - clean, elegant, and inviting.

typography.pairing_rule: Use 'Outfit' for all Headings (h1-h3) to give a modern, friendly but premium look. Use 'Inter' for body text for maximum legibility.

usage_rules.backgrounds: Use 'secondary' (#FDFBF7) for section backgrounds to break up white space. Use pure white for cards.
usage_rules.text: Never use pure black. Use 'foreground' (#4A403A) for headings and 'muted_foreground' for body.
usage_rules.ctas: Primary buttons should be #E5989B (Rose) with White text. Hover state: #B5838D.

layout_modes.hero: Split layout: Text Left (50%) + Image Right (50%) with 'floating' decorative elements.
layout_modes.menu: Grid of 3 columns. Cards must have generous internal padding (p-6 or p-8).
layout_modes.gallery: Bento Grid (Asymmetric). Mix large squares (col-span-2) with standard squares.

HeroSection.description: High impact intro. Large Heading, Subheading, 'Order Now' Primary Button, 'View Menu' Secondary Button.
HeroSection.visuals: Right side features the 'White Frosted Cake' image, possibly with a soft blob/shape behind it.
HeroSection.interaction: Fade in elements. Image floats gently.

TrustBar.description: Row of 3-4 key value props: 'Freshly Baked', '100% Eggless Options', 'Premium Ingredients', 'Home Delivery'.

MenuGrid.description: Display bestsellers. Cards with Image, Title, Description, Price, 'Add' button.
MenuGrid.card_style: White bg, shadow-sm, rounded-2xl. Hover: shadow-md, scale-105 transition-all.

OrderForm.description: The money maker. Simple form: Name, Phone, Cake Type, Date, Message.
OrderForm.action: On Submit -> Format message -> Open WhatsApp API.
OrderForm.style: Clean input fields with 'rose' focus ring. Embedded in a 'secondary' colored section.

Reviews.style: Minimalist cards. Quote icon + Text + Customer Name/Avatar.

FAQ.description: Accordion list for common questions (Delivery area, customization, etc.).

FloatingCTA.description: Sticky 'WhatsApp Order' button on mobile bottom-right.
FloatingCTA.style: Green/Brand color, pill shape, icon + text.

visual_assets.icons: Lucide React (Cake, Phone, MapPin, Star, Truck, Wheat, Clock)

motion_guidelines.hover: Cards lift (-4px) and shadow deepens. Buttons scale (0.98) on click.
motion_guidelines.scroll: Parallax effect on Hero image if possible. Lazy load images with blur-in.

accessibility_rules.contrast: Ensure #E5989B (Pink) buttons have WHITE text. If contrast is low, darken the pink to #D68C90.
accessibility_rules.focus: Focus rings must be visible (use ring-offset-2 ring-primary).
accessibility_rules.labels: All form inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

universal_guidelines_for_main_agent: Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep it legible.
Do NOT center align long paragraphs. Left align for readability.
Use 'rounded-full' for buttons to make them feel friendly.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
Mobile First: Ensure padding is smaller on mobile (px-6) and larger on desktop (px-24).
